text.autoconfig.antitoolbreak.title: Anti Tool Break Config
text.autoconfig.antitoolbreak.option.tri: Durability below which ATB prevents tool usage
text.autoconfig.antitoolbreak.option.sho: Send a command to fix tools when trigger durability is reached
text.autoconfig.antitoolbreak.option.fix: Minimum time between sending fix commands in milliseconds
text.autoconfig.antitoolbreak.option.sho: Send a command to sell items when inventory full message is received
text.autoconfig.antitoolbreak.option.sel: Minimum time between sending sell commands in milliseconds
Minimum delay after receiving an inventory full message before sending sell command
Maximum delay after receiving an inventory full message before sending sell command
